task: Develop a basic 'Day of the Tentacle' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Remember those quiet evenings'.
name: Tentacle Twilight

branding_data.short_description: Embark on a time-traveling adventure in Tentacle Twilight, where the quietude of evening holds the key to saving the world from a tentacled menace.
branding_data.detailed_description: Tentacle Twilight is a point-and-click adventure game inspired by the classic 'Day of the Tentacle.' Players must navigate through a whimsical narrative filled with eccentric characters and mind-bending puzzles. Set during the serene hours of twilight, the game introduces a unique twist on time travel, where players must harness the tranquility of evening to manipulate events across different eras. Solve puzzles, explore richly detailed environments, and interact with a quirky cast to prevent the rise of a tentacled overlord. The game's atmospheric setting and clever dialogue provide a nostalgic yet fresh experience for fans of the genre.
